metadata.title: CVE-2024-35820 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:io_uring: fix io_queue_proc modifying req->flagsWith multiple poll entries __io_queue_proc() might be running inparallel with poll handlers and possibly task_work, we should not becarelessly modifying req->flags there. io_poll_double_prepare() handlesa similar case with locking but it's much easier to move it into__io_arm_poll_handler().

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
linux-hwe package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
